name: Intellect Trainer
description:
Do you feel like you need to give your brain a boost? Then this game might be for you!

Features:

  • 2 brain training activities
  • 2 fun games
  • Objectives
  • Settings

All of these help to improve your mind, keeping it sharp in a focused but entertaining way.

DISCLAIMER: This game is not actually available on Steam and the reviews are fake. This game was a project for school and required these to seem like a professional game.
